channel.title: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes
channel.description:
according to this wiki:-
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Software#Desktop_Screenshot_Creator
shutter should work inside whonix. but i dont think this is the same with Whonix inside Qubes OS, and i think the cause of that is qubes security itself "compartmentalization".
shutter doesnt recognize or allowed to view whonix Desktop. so it is giving this message:- ------------------------------------------------- [glow=red,2,300]Error while taking the screenshot.
Keyboard could not be grabbed[/glow] --------------------------------------------------
and also another Error appears if u press on Menu inside shutter program
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [glow=red,2,300]Error while taking the screenshot.
Maybe mouse pointer could not be grabbed or the selected area is invalid.[/glow] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Update:- shutter now working inside Whonix-Qubes

Read full topic

item.title: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.source: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes

item.title: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
aha i c , well in this case dont u think we should put some highlights inside the wiki or here in the forum saying that screenshots wont work inside Qubes except from dom0 or something like that ? (preferred inside the wiki)
Yes. Can you add an infobox please? 
{{mbox
| image   = [[File:Ambox_notice.png|40px|alt=Qubes info box]]
| text       =
...
}}
also is it only the screenshots or there r another programs? (like if there is there a list or something)
There is no such list, not that I know.

Also another issue, something very special:

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: Debian Templates: linux-headers-amd64 package installation fails

opened by adrelanos on 2015-10-23
closed by marmarek on 2015-11-02 
Unpacking linux-headers-3.16.0-4-amd64 (3.16.7-ckt11-1+deb8u5) ...
dpkg: error processing archive /var/cache/apt/archives/linux-headers-3.16.0-4-amd64_3.16.7-ckt11-1+deb8u5_amd64.deb (--unpack):
 unable to clean up mess surrounding `./lib/modules/3.16.0-4-amd64' before installing another version: Read-only...
wontfix

If we collect a few of such cases, we can indeed make a list.

You can try asking on the qubes-users mailing list. Although it would be difficult to ask a good question that gets understood.

Read full topic

item.title: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
aha i c , well in this case dont u think we should put some highlights inside the wiki or here in the forum saying that screenshots wont work inside Qubes except from dom0 or something like that ? (preferred inside the wiki)

also is it only the screenshots or there r another programs? (like if there is there a list or something)

i know its not related specifically to whonix but these programs r mentioned inside whonix wiki and with no “Note” saying that using this or that program wont work with whonix-qubes because of qubes OS or so …etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Only screenshots in dom0 work. This goes for whole Qubes. Not just Qubes-Whonix.

Read full topic

item.title: Shutter (screenshot creator) doesnt work inside whonix-qubes
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
according to this wiki:-

Whonix

Software

Software Recommendations by Whonix for Encryption, E-Mail, IRC, Media-Player, Image Viewer, Screenshot Creator, Calculator, Office Suite and more

shutter should work inside whonix. but i dont think this is the same with Whonix inside Qubes OS, and i think the cause of that is qubes security itself “compartmentalization”.

shutter doesnt recognize or allowed to view whonix Desktop. so it is giving this message:-

[glow=red,2,300]Error while taking the screenshot.

Keyboard could not be grabbed[/glow]

and also another Error appears if u press on Menu inside shutter program

[glow=red,2,300]Error while taking the screenshot.

Maybe mouse pointer could not be grabbed or the selected area is invalid.[/glow]

Read full topic
